UseSecretsManager.title: Use secrets manager
UseSecretsManager.description: Whether to use or not the secrets manager. If not, secrets will be stored in the browser (local storage)

UniqueProvider.title: Use the same provider for chat and completer
UniqueProvider.description:
Whether to use only one provider for the chat and the completer.
This will overwrite all the settings for the completer, and copy the ones from the chat.
